channel.title: unity3d on Raj Pathare
channel.description: Recent content in unity3d on Raj Pathare

item.title: Angry Meteor
item.description: AngryMeteor AngryMeteor is a hypercasual game, where you need to save your planet from a meteor shower. Link Game Demo Developer Raj Pathare Platforms Android (v4.1+) PC Graphics/Textures The game graphics are specially designed for mobile users. The textures are chosen in such a way that the users may not experience any lag while playing the game. Future work To add more features in the game like - powerups, adding more custom levels.

item.title: ARNotes
item.description: An AR-based Piano(Keyboard) app which responds to your real-time key press . Download the app here Steps to be followed Take a print-out of the given piano (image),it is recommmended to take a medium-sized print for better usability. Download and install the application,the dropbox link for the same is provided above. After installing the application,open it and focus your camera on the print-out (the piano). Press the keys and enjoy playing your favourite instrument with some added twist.

item.title: Unity3D Resources
item.description: Sites Unity Official Site: Start bringing your vision to life today. Unitys real-time 3D development platform empowers you with all you need to create, operate, and monetize. Unity learn - Raywenderlich: In this Unity learning path for beginners, you will learn the fundamental techniques in Unity development, such as Animation, Sound, Particle Systems, Scripting, UI, and much more. Unity3D for Absolute Beginners: New to Unity? You should definetely check this site out.
